TextView.android:text: All good things must come to an end.” And with that, iconic Paris concept store Colette announced that it would close its doors on December 20th. Like so many, we are sad to see the shopping destination go and wanted to do something to celebrate what it meant to all who shopped, discovered, and reveled in its magic. So before the lights go out on Rue Saint-Honoré, we teamed up with co-founder Sarah Andelman to bring a little of Colette ‘Home for the Holidays’ for the very first time outside of the store and at STORY!
